ygData.subject: Re: Leveling
ygData.msgSnippet: [quote]OMG-- trying to explain /assist, targeting, avoiding hits, pet control, nuking, the benefit of the snare spell-- things we just take for
ygData.messageBody:
[quote]OMG-- trying to explain /assist,
targeting, avoiding hits, pet control, nuking, the benefit
of the snare spell-- things we just take for
granted.[/quote]<br><br>I'm trying that, on Sullon Zek! One guy I'm grouping
with regularly is a Ranger. He hit 9th level the other
day, and I said, "Great, go get your spells." He said,
"What spells?"<br><br>And yeah, /assist is an alien
concept. I don't think he's even trained Kick or Dodge.
There's also a Druid with us who's also on ger first
character, Got my work cut out for me, and I'm not even that
experienced.
